conbody.p: The deepest level of logs is called TRACE. Use the TRACE level when you need more log details than DEBUG level, which is used by default. You can also lessen the logs' details by using the INFO level.
In case you want to change the logâ€™s level of one or multiple packages, this setting is located and stored in Include > Config > log.properties file.
By uncommenting the logging.level.com.kms=TRACE line, the differences are noticeable:
